pkgmetadata.longdescription: Aspen is a filesystem router for Python web frameworks. See `aspen.io`_ forframework wrappers... _aspen.io: http://aspen.io/Installation, Testing, and License==================================``aspen`` is available on `GitHub`_ and on `PyPI`_:: $ pip install aspenWe test against 64-bit Python 2.7 and Python 3.6 on Linux: |travis|And we test against 32- and 64-bit Python 2.7 on Windows: |appveyor|``aspen`` is MIT-licensed... _GitHub: https://github.com/AspenWeb/aspen.py.. _PyPI: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/aspen.. |travis| image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/AspenWeb/aspen.py/master.svg :target: https://travis-ci.org/AspenWeb/aspen.py :alt: Linux build status.. |appveyor| image:: https://img.shields.io/appveyor/ci/AspenWeb/aspen-py/master.svg :target: https://ci.appveyor.com/project/AspenWeb/aspen-py :alt: Windows build status
